DROP VIEW VW_CDCDemo_RAW
GO

Create VIEW VW_CDCDemo_RAW
as
SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://integraadls.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/cdcdemo_adf/*/*/*/*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


Create View VW_CDCDemo_RAW_Ranking
as
SELECT
	*,
	RANK () OVER ( 
		PARTITION BY Id
        ORDER BY UpdateDateTime DESC
	) id_rank 
FROM
	VW_CDCDemo_RAW

CREATE PROCEDURE sp_Build_StagingTable_ADLS
AS
BEGIN
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'cdcstagingtable') 
	Drop EXTERNAL TABLE ext.cdcstagingtable

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.cdcstagingtable 
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'cdcdemo_stg/cdctable/latest',
	DATA_SOURCE = [rawdata_ds],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
AS SELECT ID, Name, UpdateDateTime FROM VW_CDCDemo_RAW_Ranking where id_rank = 1
END

CREATE VIEW VW_CDCDemo_Staging
as
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://integraadls.dfs.core.windows.net/curateddata/cdcdemo_stg/cdctable/latest/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


exec sp_Build_StagingTable_ADLS

select count(*) from VW_CDCDemo_Staging



CREATE PROCEDURE sp_TimeTravel_ADLS
@timetraveldate datetime
AS
BEGIN
 SELECT ID, Name, UpdateDateTime FROM VW_CDCDemo_RAW_Ranking where id_rank = 1 and UpdateDateTime <= @timetraveldate
END

exec sp_TimeTravel_ADLS '3/20/2021 12:00:00'
